item.description: One of the new features in .NET 6 is support for global using declarations. We can define using declarations as global and they work all over the project so we don’t have to define them in other files anymore.

item.title: Chinese Firedrake Jammer - Signal Identification Wiki
item.description: The Chinese Firedrake Jammer (also known as FireDragon) is a Commercial AM Broadcast jamming signal that aims to jam specific radio stations in Asia from being received by listeners. It plays the chinese folk song "The Firedrake" to jam AM radio stations.

item.title: Some Bits: Nelson's weblog
item.description: Goodreads lost my entire account last week. Nine years as a user, some 600 books and 250 carefully written reviews all deleted and unrecoverable. Their support has not been helpful. item.title: How to take credit for someone else's work on GitHub
item.description: Browsing through Git's own Git repository on GitHub, I noticed something very strange. Git was famously created by Linus Torvalds, already widely known for having created the Linux operating system. However GitHub shows the author of the first commit to the Git repo as "VanTudor".
